article.title: Arkansas U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Arizona U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​

Little Rock Office Contact Information

Little Rock U.S. Export Assistance Center
425 West Capitol Ave., Suite 425
Little Rock, AR 72201
Phone: 501-324-5794
Fax: 501-324-7380
Website: http://www.export.gov/arkansas​
​​​

Little Rock Staff

​

Name​

Industries and Specializations:

Contact

VACANT,

Director

501-324-5797

James Bledsoe,

International Trade Specialist

Aerospace & Defense, Safety and Security, Construction, Building Products, Energy Technologies, Information & Technology, Mining Equipment & Supplies, Southeast Asia, China,

Languages: Mandarin Chinese, Japanese

James.Bledsoe@trade.gov

501-324-6544

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​​
